TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1606-1607
TEI.2.document_title: James Kerr to Stephen F. Austin, 02-24-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Kerr to Austin, February 24, 1827. Property seized by De Leon. James Kerr to Austin, February 26, 1827. t Movements of Indians.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1606-1607

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Kerr to Austin, February 24, 1827. Property seized by De Leon. James Kerr to Austin, February 26, 1827. t Movements of Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-24-1827">24th. fbuary 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colo S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir, I have to complain (through you) to his *person_mentioned*Excellency */person_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Political Chief of Martin Delion*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Don Manchóles */person_mentioned*(Viz) that they have not returned to me, nor to any person for me, the within described gun, according to the order of his *person_mentioned*Excellency*/person_mentioned*, and that I therefore pray to be remunerated with the price of the same $30.00 and also the damages done to my own two guns which have been returned, as pr. within Cert 9.00*/p*
*p*I hope you will oblige me to lay this before his *person_mentioned*Excellency */person_mentioned*etc that I may have restitution made to me by the said *person_mentioned*Delion */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*manchóles*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Collorado District */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-30-1827">January 30th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*We the subscribed Do certify that the gun that *person_mentioned*Mr James kerr*/person_mentioned* Borowed of *person_mentioned*Clarissa Griflfen*/person_mentioned* was.—New and complete in all parts and that the price was thirty Dollars cash said Gun was small Bore walnut stock Iron Mounting and Double triggers Given under our hands*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jn° Andrews*/person_mentioned**/p* *p* *person_mentioned*James Cummins */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*I do hereby certify that the above gun was by me taken to the *location_mentioned*station on the Labaca*/location_mentioned*, and that it was—with other guns siezed and taken away by *location_mentioned*Martin Delion*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Moncholes*/location_mentioned*—and that it has not been returned agreeable to the order of the *person_mentioned*Political Chief*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Given under my hand this *date_mentioned n="01-30-1827">30th. day of January 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned*'s Colony Labaca Station*/location_mentioned*,—I hereby certify that, *person_mentioned*Martin Delion*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*moncholes */person_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1826">Nov. last*/date_mentioned* siezed and caused to be taken away two Rifle Guns besides the one above discribed by *person_mentioned*John Andrews*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*James Cummins*/person_mentioned*: that the same two guns have been returnd but damaged (viz)—*/p*
*p*The Cock of 1 oí the locks brock and cost me one Dollar fifty cts_____ 1. 50*/p*
*p*Screw part of same lost________ 1.00*/p*
*p*The other gun stock broke________________________________________ 5.00*/p*
*p*Tumble of the lock broke______________________________________ 1.00*/p*
*p*Thimble rod and socket end of wipers lost--------------------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p*$9.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-24-1827">24th feby. 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
